lines.text: Please you to interpose (faire Madam) kneele,

lines.speaker: Paul.
lines.text: And pray your Mothers blessing: turne good Lady,

lines.speaker: Paul.
lines.text: Our {% italic: Perdita %} is found.

lines.speaker: Her.
lines.text: You Gods looke downe,

lines.speaker: Her.
lines.text: And from your sacred Viols poure your graces

lines.speaker: Her.
lines.text: Vpon my daughters head: Tell me (mine owne)

lines.speaker: Her.
lines.text: Where hast thou bin preseru’d? Where liu’d? How found

lines.speaker: Her.
lines.text: Thy Fathers Court? For thou shalt heare that I

lines.speaker: Her.
lines.text: Knowing by {% italic: Paulina %}, that the Oracle

lines.speaker: Her.
lines.text: Gaue hope thou wast in being, haue preseru’d

lines.speaker: Her.
lines.text: My selfe, to see the yssue.

lines.speaker: Paul.
lines.text: There’s time enough for that,

lines.speaker: Paul.
lines.text: Least they desire (vpon this push) to trouble

lines.speaker: Paul.
lines.text: Your ioyes, with like Relation. Go together

lines.speaker: Paul.
lines.text: You precious winners all: your exultation

lines.speaker: Paul.
lines.text: Partake to euery one: I (an old Turtle)

lines.speaker: Paul.
lines.text: Will wing me to some wither’d bough, and there

lines.speaker: Paul.
lines.text: My Mate (that’s neuer to be found againe)

lines.speaker: Paul.
lines.text: Lament, till I am lost.

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: O peace {% italic: Paulina %}:

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: Thou shouldst a husband take by my consent,

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: As I by thine a Wife. This is a Match,

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: And made betweene’s by Vowes. Thou hast found mine,

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: But how, is to be question’d: for I saw her

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: (As I thought) dead: and haue (in vaine) said many

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: A prayer vpon her graue. Ile not seeke farre

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: (For him, I partly know his minde) to finde thee

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: An honourable husband. Come {% italic: Camillo %},

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: And take her by the hand: whose worth, and honesty

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: Is richly noted: and heere iustiﬁed

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: By Vs, a paire of Kings. Let’s from this place.

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: What? looke vpon my Brother: both your pardons,

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: That ere I put betweene your holy looks

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: My ill suspition: This your Son‑in‑law,

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: And Sonne vnto the King, whom heauens directing

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: Is troth‑plight to your daughter. Good {% italic: Paulina %},

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: Leade vs from hence, where we may leisurely

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: Each one demand, and answere to his part

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: Perform’d in this wide gap of Time, since ﬁrst

lines.speaker: Leo.
lines.text: We were disseuer’d: Hastily lead away.
